subject: Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Daniel Moreno timed his final sprint perfectly to win the fourth stage of the Vuelta a España, while Vincenzo Nibali overtook Christopher Horner for the overall lead.
snippet: Daniel Moreno timed his final sprint perfectly to win the fourth stage of the Vuelta a España, while Vincenzo Nibali overtook Christopher Horner for the overall lead.
